uvi.description:
xen/balloon: use a kernel thread instead a workqueue

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.150 by commit 29917bbb07c30be295dece245c7c21872e1a6fbb. For more details please see the references link.
